messages.title: Three Ambitions: Nine Steps Forward for our Health, Education and Economy
My pledges to you
messages.content: As a doctor, I understand the strain our NHS professionals face on a daily basis - I will fight tirelessly to ensure they have the resources and support they need.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Care and Care NHS including waiting time targets for Cancer: 28 days to diagnosis, 36 days to treatment, and additional home care charges for the elderly and people with dementia.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Well-Educated Wales: Cradle to Career Education
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Free universal pre-school for all children from 3 years of age; a national premium for teachers of £5,018 for undervalued sectors; raising aspirations and school attainment; creation of 50,000 new apprenticeships.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Wealthier Wales: Building our Economic Engine
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Major investment in our transport, energy and green infrastructure projects; work for the 21st century through a WDA for the 21st century to work as advisors and links to the market; cut business rates and give more public contracts to Welsh firms.

issues.economy: I will continue to campaign for the expansion of Welsh medium education and for the total Welsh control of our education system.
issues.education: Fighting for the total Welsh control of our education system.
issues.health: As a doctor, I understand the strain our NHS professionals face on a daily basis - I will tirelessly fight to ensure they have the resources and support they need.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a doctor, I understand the strain our NHS professionals face on a daily basis - I will fight tirelessly to ensure they have the resources and support they need.

quotes.text: Swansea Museum is a unique community asset. As your AM, I will do all I can to prevent the Labour Council closing it down.
The huge delay in electrification of the main line to Swansea is symptomatic of a system that ignores our needs. We always put South Swansea first.

images.caption: Dr Dai Lloyd alongside images illustrating his pledges and commitment to Swansea West.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Y Newid sydd ei Angen | The Change Wales Needs
